abilities.name: Fire Remedy
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a Fire Energy from your hand to Arcanine ex, remove 1 damage counter and all Special Conditions from Arcanine ex.

attacks.name: [Pokémon-ex rule]
attacks.effect: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Overrun
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
